txCreateRelationshipContent: <0>{{sender}}</0> created a relationship with <1>{{receiver}}</1> inside the subspace <2>{{subspace}}</2>
txRequestDTagTransferContent: <0>{{sender}}</0> sent a Dtag transfer request to <1>{{receiver}}</1>
txAcceptDTagTransferContent: <0>{{receiver}}</0> accepted a Dtag transfer request from <1>{{sender}}</1>
txCancelDTagTransferContent: <0>{{sender}}</0> canceled a Dtag transfer request to <1>{{receiver}}</1>
txRefuseDTagTransferContent: <0>{{receiver}}</0> refused a Dtag transfer request from <1>{{sender}}</1>
txJoinPoolContent: <0>{{sender}}</0> joined pool by ID <1>{{poolId}}</1>, deposited <2>{{amountIn}}</2> and taken out <3>{{amountOut}}</3>
txExitPoolContent: <0>{{sender}}</0> exited pool by ID <1>{{poolId}}</1>, deposited <2>{{amountIn}}</2> and taken out <3>{{amountOut}}</3>
txSwapExactAmountInContent: <0>{{sender}}</0> swapped in <1>{{amountIn}}</1> for <2>{{amountOut}}</2> in pool by ID <3>{{poolIds}}</3>
txSwapExactAmountOutContent: <0>{{sender}}</0> swapped out <1>{{amountIn}}</1> for <2>{{amountOut}}</2> in pool by ID <3>{{poolIds}}</3>
txBeginUnlockingContent: <0>{{owner}}</0> began unlocking tokens by lock ID <1>{{ID}}</1>
txUnlockPeriodLockContent: <0>{{owner}}</0> unlocked individual period lock by ID <1>{{ID}}</1>
txCreatePoolContent: <0>{{sender}}</0> created pool with assets <1>{{assets}}</1> and set future pool governor to <2>{{futurePoolGovernor}}</2>
txJoinSwapExternAmountInContent: <0>{{sender}}</0> joined swap extern amount in pool by ID <1>{{poolId}}</1>, deposited <2>{{amountIn}}</2> and taken out <3>{{amountOut}}</3>
txJoinSwapShareAmountOutContent: <0>{{sender}}</0> joined swap share amount out pool by ID <1>{{poolId}}</1>, deposited <2>{{amountIn}}</2> and taken out <3>{{amountOut}}</3>
txExitSwapShareAmountInContent: <0>{{sender}}</0> exited swap share amount in pool by ID <1>{{poolId}}</1>, deposited <2>{{amountIn}}</2> and taken out <3>{{amountOut}}</3>
txExitSwapExternAmountOutContent: <0>{{sender}}</0> exited swap extern amount out pool by ID <1>{{poolId}}</1>, deposited <2>{{amountIn}}</2> and taken out <3>{{amountOut}}</3>
txCreateGaugeContent: <0>{{owner}}</0> created gauge with <1>{{amountIn}}</1> for duration of <2>{{duration}}</2}} epochs
